name: THORIUM NORWAY
tag_list: thorium, nuclear, minerals, niobium, tantalum, scandium, indium, rhenium--tellurium
overview: Thorium Norway AS and Thoriumpower Holding AS seeks important metals for new technologies and environment-friendly energy. The companies have mining claims on approximately 60 square kilometres of ore-bearing zones in Norway. Mining rights are applied for when commercially exploitable ore deposits are found. Mining rights are granted by the Norwegian Directorate of Minin
